law.catch_line: Chapter cumulative and additional to other laws.

text.section:
Sec. 11B-6. Chapter cumulative and additional to other laws.
The provisions of this chapter shall be cumulative and additional to and not in derogation of any and all other provisions of law pertaining to fires, operations of dumps, pollution, public and private nuisances, and garbage and trash. Municipalities may establish and enforce higher standards for issuance of city permits and operation of dumps and landfill sites in the incorporated areas than those standards required herein for the issuance of a County permit.
